tips.text: Until the 7th inning, you can exit the stadium through The Hard Rock Cafe, get your hand stamped and then RE-ENTER the stadium. This is the only spot to exit and re-enter the stadium.
Bacon cheesburger after 2 am with a slice of strawberry cheese cake... It hits the spot!
Always a pleasant meal here, staff is very attentive. I've liked everything I have tried so far!
Cocktails are Right ... Steamed Clams Te delish!!
Sit in the back, next to the kitchen, to watch the magic happen and catch the aromas.
